name: swe-prep-extension
description: Interview Prep Autopilot - Automated SWE interview preparation planning

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd extension && npm install && cd ../dashboard && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build --workspace=extension && npm run build --workspace=dashboard && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint --workspace=extension && npm run lint --workspace=dashboard && npm run lint --workspace=backend

author: Saachi
